articles.title: Was there a secretive plot to evict King Richard’s Faire and build a rival kingdom?
articles.description:
CARVER — For nearly half a century, King Richard’s Faire has staked out its summer realm here, beckoning weekend visitors with a promise of ye olde escapist fantasy — knights and knaves, minstrels, maidens, and merriment.
